title: 数组测试课程 1
content: This is the first lesson in the array test. It demonstrates how multiple lessons can be imported at once using the lesson editor.

sentences.text: Multiple lessons can be imported at once.
sentences.note: 多个课程可以一次性导入。

questions.q: What can be imported at once?

title: 数组测试课程 2
content: This is the second lesson in the array test. It shows that the lesson editor can handle batch imports efficiently.

sentences.text: The lesson editor can handle batch imports efficiently.
sentences.note: 课程编辑器可以高效地处理批量导入。

questions.q: How does the lesson editor handle batch imports?
